row.process:
! BBS Include zum setzen von Variablen f端r aufgerufene Jobs :INC JOBI.BBS.JOBPDEFAULTS ! --------------------------------------------- !**********GeneratedText, Do Not Change********** :SET &pttyp# = SYS_ACT_PTTYP() !Eintragen der READ Befehle :BEGINREAD :IF &pttyp# = "D" : PRINT "", "Bei Start via GUI wird die Eingabe der Startzeit unterdr端ckt" :ELSE : READ &START#,,"START [JJJJ-MM-TT HH:MM:SS]",'',K :ENDIF :READ &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST#,,"UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST [JN]",'N',K :READ &TERMINE_IMS#,,"TERMINE_IMS [J/N]",'J',K :READ &VALUTA_VON#,,"VALUTA_VON [JJJJMMTT]",'',K :READ &VALUTA_BIS#,,"VALUTA_BIS [JJJJMMTT]",'',K :READ &MANDANTEN#,,"MANDANTEN [01,02,20,21,54]",'01,02,20,21,54',K :READ &AB_VTR_NR#,,"AB_VTR_NR [NNNN]",'',K :READ &BIS_VTR_NR#,,"BIS_VTR_NR [NNNN]",'',K :READ &PRUEFE_FRIST#,,"PRUEFE_FRIST [J/N]",'J',K :READ &FRIST_WV#,,"FRIST_WV [NNNN]",'',K :READ &TRACE#,,"TRACE [J/N]",'N',K :READ &RUN_SELEKTIERER#,,"RUN_SELEKTIERER [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_BEARBEITER#,,"RUN_BEARBEITER [J/N]",'J',K :READ &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL#,,"PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL [OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE]",'OK',K :READ &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL#,,"PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL [INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE]",'INFO',K :READ &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA#,,"PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA [OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE]",'OK',K :READ &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA#,,"PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA [INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE]",'INFO',K :ENDREAD
!Eintragen der PSET Befehle :PSET &START# = &START# :PSET &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# = &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# :PSET &TERMINE_IMS# = &TERMINE_IMS# :PSET &VALUTA_VON# = &VALUTA_VON# :PSET &VALUTA_BIS# = &VALUTA_BIS# :PSET &MANDANTEN# = &MANDANTEN# :PSET &AB_VTR_NR# = &AB_VTR_NR# :PSET &BIS_VTR_NR# = &BIS_VTR_NR# :PSET &PRUEFE_FRIST# = &PRUEFE_FRIST# :PSET &FRIST_WV# = &FRIST_WV# :PSET &TRACE# = &TRACE# :PSET &RUN_SELEKTIERER# = &RUN_SELEKTIERER# :PSET &RUN_BEARBEITER# = &RUN_BEARBEITER# :PSET &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL# = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL# :PSET &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL# = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL# :PSET &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# :PSET &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# !**************End of GeneratedText************** ! --------------------------------------------- :SET &MONATSERSTER# = FIRST_OF_PERIOD(&DATUM_AM#, "MM", "JJJJMMTT") :SET &MONATSERSTER_1M_MINUS# = SUB_PERIOD("JJJJMMTT:&MONATSERSTER#","MM;1","JJJJMMTT") :SET &MONATSERSTER_2M_MINUS# = SUB_PERIOD("JJJJMMTT:&MONATSERSTER#","MM;2","JJJJMMTT") :IF &VALUTA_VON# = "" : PSET &VALUTA_VON# = &MONATSERSTER_2M_MINUS# :ENDIF :IF &VALUTA_BIS# = "" : PSET &VALUTA_BIS# = "&MONATSERSTER_1M_MINUS#" :ENDIF ! mit cr31435 entfallen ! :IF &NO_TIME_MIN# = "" ! : PSET &NO_TIME_MIN# = "0" ! :ENDIF ! ---------------------------------------------
